text: Dobrolet, Russia or Dobrolot is a village in Irkutsky District, on the Goloustenskiy Trakt (Голоустенский тракт) located west of Lake Baikal in the Irkutsk Oblast, , in eastern Siberia, Russia. ==References== ==External links== Category:Rural localities in Irkutsk Oblast
title: Dobrolet, Russia
